reviews.review: Obra maestra
very good mmm

I spent many hours playing this game on the Xbox 360 as a junior in high school, skipping class, baked as a cake with my friend. It probably took us about two weeks to go through co-op. I also played through the single player campaign in its entirety twice on console and once on PC a few years later. The humor is great, the gameplay is astounding, and its worth playing at LEAST once. 

The game is a lot more fun if you've played the first portal, which is a really quick game to run through. 

Just play this game. It's worth it.
to good of a game don't buy, you will get addicted to it like drug!!!
Roses are red, Wheatley is blue, GLADOS is a potato, and (technically) so are you.

Played the co-op with a friend from across the world and it was well designed and enjoyed playing with him. Overall think that they applied the same logic based puzzle solving from the first game but added more content and a co-op mode which was the main reason I bought it.

I still remember my first time booting up this game and failing the first couple of puzzles, being frustrated over my own stupidity until I started thinking with portals. The game somehow doesn't get repetitive even though all you do is shoot portals around the levels - which is something that baffles me today still.

Just amazing. While portal may have felt a little unfinished and clunky at times, portal 2 fixes it all, at least for me it did. The game feels much more complete and organized, and everything seems to be in the game for a reason. Compared to portal 1, it has a much longer single player campaign with much more depth to it. New game mechanics, and also the co-op gamemode make portal feel new and exciting again. To top all of that, there are thousands of workshop maps made by other players to complete, and an active modding community with multiple large mods being made by the minute. If you liked portal, you'll most certainly enjoy portal 2.
지금 뵈도 손색없는 깔끔한 그래픽과 게임을 할 때에는 수능 30번을 풀고 있는 기분을 느끼게 해준다. ㅈ같지만 깼을 떄의 카타르시스는 가히 천하제일이라 할 수 있다.

Dieses Spiel ist meiner Meinung  nach ein Meisterwerk. Die kreative und auch an manchen stellen lustigen Story 
ist ziemlich gut. Und die rätsel sind kreativ und sehr oft genjal. Das mit denn Portalen setzen ist sehr cool und meiner meinung noch hoeute sehr inovativ. Die Grafik ist heute noch ganz passable und die Spielwelt ist sehr detailiert. Ein klenier kritikpunkt ist das sich der teil in der mitte sich ein bisschen langezogen hat. Aber sonst ist es ein rund um gelungenes Spiel mit guter Musik cooler Story und coolen rätseln

This is one game I would tell my children to play.

It's not only a game, It's an art form. The story is as iconic as any super-hero origin story where people still talk about and reference it 10 years later. The gameplay is unique to both newcomers and veterans alike. like every other valve games before, the game doesn't thrust you into an environment where you would feel like an alien that just landed and learning the lingo and culture. NO. It teaches you as you go. Good pacing, good presentation and very well made and memorable characters.

10/10, would play again... and again... and again... and again... and again... and...

单人剧情通关成功，搞FPS起家的V社用FPS的另一种玩法为我们展开了一段奇妙的冒险。建模和优化都十分优秀，声优的发音和说话的节奏都让人感到清爽不拖沓，游戏模式和剧情搭配的几乎完美无缺，游戏性极强，特别是多人合作模式，没有合作，乐趣就少了一大半。唯一美中不足的地方是：电脑语言是二进制的，而V社却用3进制编程。
Incredible puzzle game, if you enjoy a nice game with good puzzles, this is definitly a must play game
